questionTitle: <u><font color='red'>On behalf of</font></u> <u><font color='red'>all of us</font></u> who <u><font color='red'>are</font></u> here this morning, I would like <u><font color='red'>thanking</font></u> Mr. Carnegie for his help.
Today <u><font color='red'>we</font></u> know <u><font color='red'>that</font></u> the earth is one of nine planets <u><font color='red'>who</font></u> <u><font color='red'>obit</font></u> the sun.

John <u><font color='red'>bought</font></u> this vocabulary book <u><font color='red'>that</font></u> he <u><font color='red'>could go over</font></u> all the things he <u><font color='red'>has studied</font></u> this year.
I can't understand how your father managed to ________ that man. He had deceived all the rest of us.
Our car is much older ________ than yours.
I ________ in bed all night thinking about it.
According to the doctor, there's absolutely nothing the ________ with you.
I looked everywhere but I couldn't find ________ at all.
It was ________ a simple question that everyone answered it correctly.
I'm sorry, but I like my eggs soft ________, not hard .
John was amazed when the train arrived exactly ________ time.
I'd like to take this ________ of wishing you all the best of luck with your exams.
Learners of English as a foreign language often fail to ________ between unfamiliar sounds in that language.
________ my opinion, French cheese is better than English cheese.
Father would not ________ us to go there for the weekend .
Every day the old man's dog goes to the shop to ________ him a newspaper.
Rex: It's already half-past six. Hal: Good heavens, so it is! It's time we ________.
I drove around the town for half an hour but couldn't find a car ________.
The smell was so bad that it completely ________ us off our food .
Although he hasn't said anything he ________ to be upset about it.
It's strange. His sister are blonde, ________ he is very dark.
We very much ________ that you will come to dinner next Friday.
Crops are often completely destroyed by ________ of locusts.
